metadata.title: CVE-2023-3745 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow issue was found in ImageMagick'sPushCharPixel() function in quantum-private.h. This issue may allow a localattacker to trick the user into opening a specially crafted file,triggering an out-of-bounds read error and allowing an application tocrash, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
